players_page.title: Players
players_page.reset_scores_description: This will reset all player scores to 0. This action cannot be undone.

score_list_page.no_rounds_available: No rounds available. Add players or set manual rounds.

pwa_install.title: How to Install App
pwa_install.ios_step1: Tap the 'Share' button in your browser's toolbar.
pwa_install.android_step1: Tap the 'More' button (three dots) in your browser's toolbar.
pwa_install.android_step2: Then, tap 'Install app' or 'Add to Home Screen'.
pwa_install.desktop_step1: In your browser's address bar, look for the 'Install' icon.
pwa_install.desktop_step2: Click it to add the app to your computer.
pwa_install.other: Follow your browser's instructions to add this web app to your home screen.
